mapper.sql: id, owner, price, categories, name, summary, exhibitdate, isdelete, issale, old, undercarriagedate, enjoy, isline, buyday, usetime, picture, userid, adv, originalcost, num
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from goods
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into goods (id, owner, price, categories, name, summary, exhibitdate, isdelete, issale, old, undercarriagedate, enjoy, isline, buyday, usetime, picture, userid, adv, originalcost, num) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exhibitdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{issale,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{old,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{undercarriagedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enjoy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usetime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update goods
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner = #{record.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{record.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
categories = #{record.categories,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods gd inner JOIN goodsimg gi where gd.id = gi.goodsid
SELECT * FROM goods gd inner JOIN goodsimg gi where gd.id = gi.goodsid
select * from goods where adv IS NOT NULL
SELECT * from goods gd INNER JOIN goodsimg gi on gd.id=gi.goodsid where gd.userid = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT id from goods where id=(select max(id) from goods)
